alert.note: Alert for Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 10:36PM CDT until June 03 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lee County in south central Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1035 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tanglewood, or near Lexington, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Tanglewood, Old Dime Box, Blue and Leo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
